Posts.EditableText:
Hello. 

This is a small gamebook I made about how an apocalypse is triggered by a man and a vending machine. Relatively light-hearted, but never to the point where the whole thing can be written off as a joke, I'd say. My first attempt at making something in Quest to begin with.

Link:

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/_z6lqqsin0gauns51dijfg/20-cents

Any and all feedback is appreciated.

Hello.

This is a small gamebook I made about how an apocalypse is triggered by a man and a vending machine. Relatively light-hearted, but never to the point where the whole thing can be written off as a joke, I'd say. My first attempt at making something in Quest to begin with.
